net.viktorc.detroid.util

Class GrayCode

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.viktorc.detroid.util.GrayCode

  • public class GrayCode
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class for gray coding integers and for converting gray coded numbers into their natural values.
    Author:
    Viktor

    • Method Summary

      Converts a gray coded number to its natural value.

        public static final long encode(long n)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Converts a number to its gray coded value.
        Parameters:
        n - The natural value of the number.
        Returns:
        The gray coded value of the number.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If n < 0.

        public static final long decode(long g)
        Converts a gray coded number to its natural value.
